text: Dinesh Chandra Rupasinghe Gunawardena (, ; born 2 March 1949) is a Sri Lankan politician who was the 15th Prime Minister of Sri Lanka from 2022 to 2024. He has served as a member of parliament, cabinet minister, and Leader of the House in the Parliament of Sri Lanka. ==Notes== ==References== Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Prime Ministers of Sri Lanka
title: Dinesh Gunawardena
